A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
(Spoilers included)

It was...bad. It was a bad film\, and it was an exceptionally bad Star Wars film.

Which isn't to say there weren't some GENUINELY good moments. The scene with Snoke's Star Destroyer and Holodo's Cruiser? Awesome. The subpar slapstick humor and plot holes? No.

What is the WORST offense Johnson made? It doesn't FEEL like a Star Wars film\, and that's the most damning thing possible.
